name: probabilistic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
based on or relating to how likely it is that something will happen : These examples illustrate the probabilistic rather than causal status of risk factors. Our method is entirely probabilistic, and requires only weak conditions that may readily be verified in practice.
More examplesFewer examplesIn probabilistic terms it is too much of a coincidence.This fuzzy, probabilistic approach is a sensible one.His model of cognition limits description of probabilistic associations derived from the interaction of speakers with their environment.
